verses.verse: And Bezalel<WH1212> made<WH6213> the ark<WH727> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>: two cubits<WH520> and a half<WH2677> was the length<WH753> of it<WH520>, and a cubit and a half<WH2677> the breadth<WH7341> of it<WH520>, and a cubit and a half<WH2677> the height of it<WH6967>.
And he overlaid<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091> within<WH1004> and without<WH2351>, and made<WH6213> a crown<WH2213> of gold<WH2091> to it round about<WH5439>.

And he cast<WH3332> for it four<WH702> rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091>, in the four<WH702> feet<WH6471> thereof<WH8147>; even two rings<WH2885> on the one<WH259> side<WH6763> of it<WH8147>, and two rings<WH2885> on the other<WH8145> side of it<WH6763>.
And he made<WH6213> staves<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>.
And he put<WH935> the staves<WH905> into the rings<WH2885> on the sides<WH6763> of the ark<WH727>, to bear<WH5375> the ark<WH727>.

And he made<WH6213> a mercy-seat<WH3727> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>: two cubits<WH520> and a half<WH2677> was the length<WH753> thereof<WH520>, and a cubit and a half<WH2677> the breadth thereof<WH7341>.
And he made<WH6213> two<WH8147> cherubim<WH3742> of gold<WH2091>; of beaten work<WH4749> made<WH6213> he them<WH8147>, at the two ends<WH7098> of the mercy-seat<WH3727>;

one <WH259> cherub<WH3742> at the one end<WH7098>, and one<WH259> cherub<WH3742> at the other end<WH7098>: of one piece with the mercy-seat<WH3727> made<WH6213> he the cherubim<WH3742> at the two<WH8147> ends thereof<WH7098>.

And the cherubim<WH3742> spread out<WH6566> their wings<WH3671> on high<WH4605>, covering<WH5526> the mercy-seat<WH3727> with their wings<WH3671>, with their faces<WH6440> one<WH376> to another<WH251>; toward the mercy-seat<WH3727> were the faces<WH6440> of the cherubim<WH3742>.

And he made<WH6213> the table<WH7979> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>: two cubits<WH520> was the length<WH753> thereof<WH520>, and a cubit the breadth<WH7341> thereof<WH520>, and a cubit and a half<WH2677> the height thereof<WH6967>.
And he overlaid<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>, and made<WH6213> thereto a crown<WH2213> of gold<WH2091> round about<WH5439>.
And he made<WH6213> unto it a border<WH4526> of a handbreadth<WH2948> round about<WH5439>, and made<WH6213> a golden<WH2091> crown<WH2213> to the border<WH4526> thereof round about<WH5439>.
And he cast<WH3332> for it four<WH702> rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091>, and put<WH5414> the rings<WH2885> in the four<WH702> corners<WH6285> that were on the four<WH702> feet thereof<WH7272>.
Close by<WH5980> the border<WH4526> were the rings<WH2885>, the places<WH1004> for the staves<WH905> to bear<WH5375> the table<WH7979>.
And he made<WH6213> the staves<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>, to bear<WH5375> the table<WH7979>.

And he made<WH6213> the vessels<WH3627> which were upon the table<WH7979>, the dishes<WH7086> thereof<WH3709>, and the spoons thereof<WH4518>, and the bowls thereof<WH7184>, and the flagons thereof<WH2004>, wherewith to pour<WH5258> out<WH2889>, of pure gold<WH2091>.

And he made<WH6213> the candlestick<WH4501> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>: of beaten work<WH4749> made<WH6213> he the candlestick<WH4501>, even its base<WH3409>, and its shaft<WH7070>; its cups<WH1375>, it knops<WH3730>, and its flowers<WH6525>, were of one piece with it.

And there were six<WH8337> branches<WH7070> going out<WH3318> of the sides<WH6654> thereof<WH7969>; three branches<WH7070> of the candlestick<WH4501> out of the one<WH259> side<WH6654> thereof<WH7969>, and three branches<WH7070> of the candlestick<WH4501> out of the other<WH8145> side thereof<WH6654>:

three <WH7969> cups<WH1375> made like almond-blossoms<WH8246> in one<WH259> branch<WH7070>, a knop<WH3730> and a flower<WH6525>, and three<WH7969> cups<WH1375> made like almond-blossoms<WH8246> in the other<WH259> branch<WH7070>, a knop<WH3730> and a flower<WH6525>: so for the six<WH8337> branches<WH7070> going out<WH3318> of the candlestick<WH4501>.
And in the candlestick<WH4501> were four<WH702> cups<WH1375> made like almond-blossoms<WH8246>, the knops<WH3730> thereof<WH6525>, and the flowers thereof;

and a knop<WH3730> under two<WH8147> branches<WH7070> of one piece with it<WH3730>, and a knop under two<WH8147> branches<WH7070> of one piece with it<WH3730>, and a knop under two<WH8147> branches<WH7070> of one piece with it<WH8337>, for the six branches<WH7070> going out of it<WH3318>.
Their knops<WH3730> and their branches<WH7070> were of one piece with it<WH259>: the whole of it was one beaten work<WH4749> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>.
And he made<WH6213> the lamps<WH5216> thereof<WH7651>, seven, and the snuffers<WH4457> thereof<WH4289>, and the snuffdishes thereof<WH2889>, of pure gold<WH2091>.
Of a talent<WH3603> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091> made<WH6213> he it<WH3627>, and all the vessels thereof.

And he made<WH6213> the altar<WH4196> of incense<WH7004> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>: a cubit<WH520> was the length<WH753> thereof<WH520>, and a cubit the breadth<WH7341> thereof<WH7251>, foursquare; and two cubits<WH520> was the height<WH6967> thereof<WH7161>; the horns thereof were of one piece with it.

And he overlaid<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>, the top<WH1406> thereof<WH7023>, and the sides thereof round about<WH5439>, and the horns<WH7161> of it<WH6213>: and he made unto it a crown<WH2213> of gold<WH2091> round about<WH5439>.

And he made<WH6213> for it two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> rings<WH2885> under the crown<WH2213> thereof<WH8147>, upon the two ribs<WH6763> thereof<WH8147>, upon the two sides<WH6654> of it<WH1004>, for places for staves<WH905> wherewith to bear it<WH5375>.
And he made<WH6213> the staves<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>.
And he made<WH6213> the holy<WH6944> anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and the pure<WH2889> incense<WH7004> of sweet spices<WH5561>, after the art<WH4639> of the perfumer<WH7543>.
